Articles.Content:
Hi y'all,

Recently, when trying to access the forums, I've been getting an "Error 501: Bad Gateway!" error. A refresh has always fixed it, but it's really annoying. Has anyone else been experiencing this? It said about there being an error on the forum's end. It says something along the lines of: "Host: Normal. Network: Normal. Servers: Error!".

Thanks in advance,

SecondHandRocketScience

Edited March 10, 2022 by Second Hand Rocket Science
changed the first "says" to "said"
Occasionally I get that error but it goes away if I refresh the page.
We have passed this along to our IT.
